categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: An Ithorian was a member of Chodo Habat's herd and later became a Jedi. The energy cell fixture from this Jedi's lightsaber later fell into the possession of Habat, who offered it to Meetra Surik for her aid in bringing the Telosian Restoration Project to fruition.
